elements.2211.03149_6becf3bc1e086db713f0563ffafb1: To demonstrate the value of machine learning based smart health technologies, researchers have to deploy their solutions into complex real-world environments with real participants
elements.2211.03149_6b61dd4b98212bb6ebb4d768ad258: This gives rise to many, oftentimes unexpected, challenges for creating technology in a lab environment that will work when deployed in real home environments
elements.2211.03149_a28ee31c4cc86f1e6335cea134f65: In other words, like more mature disciplines, we need solutions for what can be done at development time to increase success at deployment time
elements.2211.03149_43df5361aa822a905743f73b78a38: To illustrate an approach and solutions, we use an example of an ongoing project that is a pipeline of voice based machine learning solutions that detects the anger and verbal conflicts of the participants
elements.2211.03149_1f12b97780cd8c0c81a53d0c1bc52: For anonymity, we call it the XYZ system
elements.2211.03149_6d164e49cb2abd23c892be6cb114a: XYZ is a smart health technology because by notifying the participants of their anger, it encourages the participants to better manage their emotions
elements.2211.03149_2e5a906330c74225acf50874e8526: This is important because being able to recognize one's emotions is the first step to better managing one's anger
elements.2211.03149_4d1ff06d177eab6d4ac5251c528b4: XYZ was deployed in 6 homes for 4 months each and monitors the emotion of the caregiver of a dementia patient
elements.2211.03149_40b00e89a432e0f588c6299564761: In this paper we demonstrate some of the necessary steps to be accomplished during the development stage to increase deployment time success, and show where continued work is still necessary
elements.2211.03149_b7e03030fe69906c1d2c27885e334: Note that the complex environments arise both from the physical world and from complex human behavior.
elements.2211.03149_96407e4146d721ac08816207469c7: Smart health research teams often develop novel machine learning technologies
elements.2211.03149_9a62a7c9f219699215fd7cffadf44: To prove the value of the technologies, the research teams have to deploy the solutions into a complex environment such as a smart home
elements.2211.03149_f492c23048ffde2ad611ca158b49a: However, the aforementioned works do not describe the problems related to the transition from the development stage to the deployment stage
elements.2211.03149_d73a5589701ba9c7c4947fad907de: In other words, during the development stage, the research teams try to develop their solution in an environment, usually a lab environment and/or a controlled home environment, which is less complex than the environment in which the technology is going to be deployed
elements.2211.03149_61f72a3c680dd4df68ac9cac3c1b2: It is well known that when new technology is actually deployed in real complex environments, issues previously unseen in the less complex environments are going to occur, especially for long-term deployments
elements.2211.03149_eff926391288d7c345d7ceb471996: This paper describes the XYZ System, a pipeline of voice-based machine learning solutions for in-home monitoring of the emotion and verbal conflict experienced by a caregiver of a dementia patient
elements.2211.03149_b03f6e0bca33dc5a6bb7dd77ced83: XYZ is considered a smart home technology because it helps caregivers of dementia patients better manage their anger by notifying them when an anger or verbal conflict is detected
elements.2211.03149_1c5aa20afad447ad38eeb27b7ee95: have discussed, one school of promoting emotion regulation is to permit the individuals from experiencing anger
elements.2211.03149_2adfbaf235b22f2bc665867764551: Since people can be bad at recognizing their own emotions
elements.2211.03149_fd9485fd667b7c6e6482df6dee6f9: , a smart health technology that notifies them when an anger or verbal conflict arises is very important to their emotion regulation
elements.2211.03149_ef60fc45da8e9351496c1d3bdb58f: The goals of this paper are to (1) demonstrate solutions for what are needed at pre-deployment time to increase the success of voice-based classifiers once deployed, and (2) present lessons learned for environmental and behavioral complexities uncovered
elements.2211.03149_460b5811ca540df898a8f5791a74d: The main challenges of integrating novel machine learning technology into complex environments are that both the physical environments and the participants' behaviors are complicated
elements.2211.03149_ec2414225f4af6515af730209fd04: For a smart health technology that uses voice for emotion detection
elements.2211.03149_8b1b426dae08bb57c122fd54ac677: , the environment is complicated because the solution needs to address the problems of acoustic signal's deterioration due to background noise such as birds chirping, room reverberation due to the signal bouncing off the surface of furniture, and deamplification as a result of the distance between the human speaker and the microphone
elements.2211.03149_312abdfeb21c9ef907a9b38a506e8: We call these environmental distortions acoustical realisms
elements.2211.03149_75c4c5cb8684a87d292368746cfd0: Also, the television could be on and the voice from the television adds to the complexity of detecting the participants' emotions
elements.2211.03149_932cb934cd1150619448c454cd61a: Human behavior is very complicated, too
elements.2211.03149_18307568137a7106a4c1e6c8b7ff5: For example, people could be yelling across the room to ask each other what is for dinner
elements.2211.03149_d63bc1e5640e38ba9a785e0b9dfa1: They are not necessarily angry, but yelling itself is seen as an anger event by typical emotion detection technology
elements.2211.03149_138bc1609938a56e6455896b5dc5f: Visitors are common and for privacy the caregiver may turn the system off and forget to turn it back on
elements.2211.03149_5a022b692ecc21336dcefb197fc0b: The gist of our solutions at pre-deployment time to ensure maximizing the post-deployment success of the machine learning algorithms in the XYZ System is that we make sure to evaluate the algorithms on data samples that are most similar to the samples that the algorithms are about to encounter in the designated environment in which the algorithms are/will be deployed
elements.2211.03149_2a1705d715868e84a4f6316f37ab3: Using the XYZ System as an example, the (acoustical) samples that the algorithms in the XYZ System are about to encounter in its designated environment (a participant's home) are voice samples that are environmentally distorted
elements.2211.03149_4824fcdeb3e9ad7075480ea461741: It is worth-noting that some works, such as Chen et al.
elements.2211.03149_bfa5c832480ba410a72b3bd64b170: , do consider the designated environment in which their algorithm is going to be deployed during the pre-deployment stage
elements.2211.03149_0bd26a56175b60375385569cfd982: However, they do not evaluate if their hypothesis that the algorithm
elements.2211.03149_0d3f75555409e4b65cd57b5b65e08: Unlike works such as Chen et al.
elements.2211.03149_b0c70c88bf2db037621f5d5bb66b6: , we perform evaluations to show that after our rigorous pre-deployment time assessment of the algorithms to be deployed in the designated environment, our chosen algorithms indeed perform well during the post-deployment stage when they are being deployed in the designated environment (the home of a patient-caregiver dyad), which is one novelty of this paper
elements.2211.03149_b41ffd0650855d3c9cab3c6d573a0: A more nuanced finding of this paper is that different acoustic components need to address different environmental realisms
elements.2211.03149_a0d539310a5f143ba04aa5deae18a: For example, the voice activity detection (VAD) model only needs to deal with non-speech background noise, reverberation, and deamplification, whereas the emotion detection model needs to also deal with background speech (such as those from the tv) because background speech could confound the classification of the emotion detection model which uses speech to determine the emotion in that speech
elements.2211.03149_4e690252b814e074d25df789f6746: The purpose of the XYZ System is that we want to help caregivers of dementia patients to manage their anger as well as the verbal conflict events that arise during care-giving
elements.2211.03149_cbf51c80867b35b9de952f1189739: To achieve these goals, the XYZ System has three add-on components: the Cloud to which the audio clips are uploaded for safe keeping, the M2G monitoring component that notifies the developer(s) if the XYZ System crashes so the developer(s) can investigate the causes, and the Recommender System using EMA, which sends messages that are interventions or recommendations to help the caregivers manage their emotions and verbal conflict, if anger or verbal conflict are detected by the XYZ System
elements.2211.03149_8634a4364d355f8ccf2d146fbcc5c: The entirety of the XYZ System and the three add-on components are referred to as the
elements.2211.03149_843d40ae62bb38274abd32346ac3d: We also present some lessons learned on several aspects of
elements.2211.03149_34e667137a9c40e68a16b4a0a8cd4: Note that the focus of this paper is the XYZ System, not its add-on components, so we do not evaluate how effective the add-on components are at helping the caregiver manage their emotions and verbal conflicts that arise during care-giving
elements.2211.03149_505c7e0b72771373f04ab1ae9685d: Nonetheless, given their essential role at helping the XYZ System achieve its goals, we have decided to include some discussion of the add-on components in the paper.
elements.2211.03149_5bf7a48ef9ae7f52a7dc04e2654aa: The contributions of this paper are based on the in-home deployed XYZ-W system from

elements.2211.03149_c7acc2736c73467c087605269d7bb: Developing a set of privacy mechanisms that are shown to help dyad recruitment and satisfy privacy concerns of actual users of the system.
elements.2211.03149_90d929d894c49ccfd2cefb5eee4c5: Our post-deployment validation indicates that people are not always good at recognizing their own emotions, which reconfirms similar findings in the literature

elements.2211.03149_c6a50c360fa182ae652826ca53e54: Methodology for Deploying Smart Health Technologies
elements.2211.03149_ccb29382ad9e1ba496b3b1da0db8b: argue that deploying smart health technologies can improve healthcare availability, cost, and access
elements.2211.03149_ae6fa5f4cf9cc5292cc34e9d96af4: However, there have not been enough works for the methodology for deploying smart health technologies (usually in smart homes)
elements.2211.03149_96ea2dc1a0812eb70860256d86c81: is among the first works that propose a design methodology that matches smart health requirements
elements.2211.03149_83c7bbfba6ad0be3bd374fcb6d496: They argued that due to the rapidly aging world population, smart health technologies are about to playing an even more important role in caring for the aging population at homes
elements.2211.03149_7b553dffb33756cad24b1bc0199c0: They propose that the perspective of deploying those smart health technologies at homes should be user-centered
elements.2211.03149_0260cc1e7bc637aa842f7a13453a0: To select a solution to be deployed, researchers need to perform domain analysis (surveying the state of the art), requirement gathering (stakeholder elicitation), requirement integration (determining the consistency of the requirements), and then finally solution selection.
elements.2211.03149_e6d2c5d28e2df05199ea16e97bdc2: Human behavior that affects the efficacy of smart technologies
elements.2211.03149_be681c8b3db0878332f47682e446f: There has not been enough work on how human behavior affects the efficacy of smart technologies
elements.2211.03149_83ea1048c25caa3a726f7d3bcd4c1: hypothesizes that the perceived usefulness directly contributes to the user's attitude towards the technology
elements.2211.03149_7789b4e0bff323e305e3790573719: suggest that perceived innovation and cost directly contribute to if the user will adopt a smart technology
elements.2211.03149_b01f3bd054549fd8248e6e113fc3f: point out that the attitude of the user directly affects the adoption of smart technologies, which we would like to extend to that their attitude directly affects the efficacy of smart technologies as shown by the observation of a user of our XYZ system: he was not very compliant and sometimes pulled out the wires to the laptop on which we ran our system
elements.2211.03149_511af8043f7d66af54c3b7d245e64: As a result, the computer was out-of-power and the system was unable to monitor the participant's emotion for a period.

elements.2211.03149_d4c665091913d2f401fc1c23c3e5c: Realisms that the SID model faces arise from background noise, especially the tv sounds
elements.2211.03149_83e739a7da0c6206196789b70b373: Note that the realisms that the SID model needs to deal with are more complex than the realisms that the VAD model needs to deal with, as voice from the tv could confound the model from correctly identifying the identity of the speaker in an audio clip
elements.2211.03149_86b7a6978be279a3f641dd9b5ffc7: In other words, the SID model needs to be able to deal with more complex background noise (more complex acoustical realisms) than the VAD model.
elements.2211.03149_c75fef9c47c46a022b8c99151cdf5: There have also been a lot of work
elements.2211.03149_acdd0c16c901f1725b2b77ce31cb4: on using voice as a modality to classify emotions
elements.2211.03149_331c8b1c328410e1e8062945cb708: These use several datasets that have speech files with emotion labels
elements.2211.03149_e62ecba6ec7e16614506ed66fbb1f: EMO-DB, a dataset of the German language
elements.2211.03149_d4cc482ae9b5dc6393c4e183aa1d8: , is a popular one for many works
elements.2211.03149_12168dad6f6c524c9bd56b44ddaa0: It consists of six emotion categories such as anger, sadness, and happiness performed by actors
elements.2211.03149_662fba80ced12bca3becb5cafff1f: that consists not only of the emotional utterances, but also video footage of emotional speech
elements.2211.03149_5de04e3b0e9d09c0c7f35946757a3: , like RAVDESS, contains both audio and audio-video samples
elements.2211.03149_d23bf5e466a532bec03c7aadcd500: Despite the variety in modalities, since some datasets like EMO-DB have only audio samples, and others like RAVDESS have both audio and video samples, the emotions that they have are largely in common
elements.2211.03149_1fcf4a2238549386fb710a499f345: The common emotion categories in the datasets are happiness, anger, sadness, and neutrality
elements.2211.03149_48e02e4c2ac4db7999ee6b259621b: One common problem with the emotional utterance datasets is that they are often collected in controlled studio environments in which realisms expected in a real, designated environment do not exist
elements.2211.03149_f5b2ab85a6917c820892a3b6de3de: Algorithms trained on those samples are shown not to be robust when deployed in the real world
elements.2211.03149_b64a53d8eedd55ec42dafbece939a: There have been works that attempt to address environmental distortions such as reverberation, deamplification, and the background noise at pre-deployment time
elements.2211.03149_def6c1d6b73fbcadd59330f827d13: However, they do not confirm at post-deployment stage if their strategies of addressing the realisms work
elements.2211.03149_1f621190263a9f5aaefaacb1e88f9: The realisms that the emotion detection model needs to address, in addition to deamplification, reverberation, and common indoor background noise, are tv sounds
elements.2211.03149_590b5f60e789fb3eb5a031dfffbb5: An audio clip produced by a registered speaker could include background sounds that are from the tv, and the speech from the tv could confound the emotion detection model from making the correct prediction as the speech from the tv could be of a different emotion than the speech produced by the registered speakers.
elements.2211.03149_55dd2b1fdf10cf1ddd41562718dc8: There have been several attempts to detect verbal conflict using sound signals that a microphone picks up from the ambient environment
elements.2211.03149_ff6aeea40c797b1f680f4f724df3a: creates verbal conflict between pairs of a student and an actor who act out conflict
elements.2211.03149_29214b65390f9f86fe66000eece45: From the generated conflict episode, it is observed that overlapped speech is an important indicator of interpersonal conflict
elements.2211.03149_0d5c3d245730f83ab955749942ebf: However, they did not create a model of automatic conflict detection based on their conclusion
elements.2211.03149_32cacacc4e5fb943be8ca25e39b3d: Based on the fact that repetition of parts of speech, such as syllables, phrases and words, is indicative of interpersonal conflict, another work
elements.2211.03149_b0ab18c1263411dac151629477563: develops a repetition detection model that uses the audio files collected by the on-body sensors of police officers to detect conflict
elements.2211.03149_537a1039d49cec23b4b62710b3c77: However, the interpersonal conflicts that police officers encounter during their jobs are not the same as every-day interpersonal conflicts that take place in households between arguing family members
elements.2211.03149_aef8e1bc3328f2da6edba3171685c: The state-of-the-art modules on automatic conflict detection using speech
elements.2211.03149_3375b5b9b3511c63bdc9d81ddea93: , achieve satisfactory performance on their respective datasets, but their approaches are not evaluated to demonstrate if acoustic distortions of noise, distance, and reverberation affect the results
elements.2211.03149_b760f80c690cbcaaef2db0102d64c: As a result, the automatic detection of every-day harmful interpersonal conflicts among people in home environments remains unsolved
elements.2211.03149_3102eccb07a9755e5fc5b30649144: Again, in addition to the realisms such as reverberation, common indoor background noise, and deamplification, the conflict detection model, just as the emotion detection model, needs to deal with the realisms that are the tv sound: the characters on the tv might be in a verbal conflict (as the background sound for the participants whose conflict we want to monitor), which can confound the conflict detection model.
elements.2211.03149_309470075fde2121f75bbca582f83: An Overview of the XYZ System
elements.2211.03149_c75fc82d6ee53376a60f387fe6d68: In this section, we describe the XYZ System, which includes the voice activity detection (VAD) algorithm, the speaker identification (SID) algorithm, the emotion detection algorithm, and the conflict detection algorithm
elements.2211.03149_f098283f33cc9ed6d0586e06f7241: Three out of the four algorithms are off-the-shelf
elements.2211.03149_a273b00e1f798ee3afd8df85b7ad3: The VAD algorithm is Google's transcription services
elements.2211.03149_d6802760f2fc7110ef0766c0fb987: The SID algorithm is the WavLM algorithm developed by Microsoft
elements.2211.03149_829aa2e7b9ffa8febd175258495a3: The emotion detection algorithm is developed by SpeechBrain
elements.2211.03149_9046faffdd2ff86937fb046208a99: We developed the conflict detection by ourselves, and the reference to the conflict detection paper is left blank to preserve our anonymity
elements.2211.03149_a317ad13e914c5bf03a6cb5c697cf: In later sections of this paper, we thoroughly tested the off-the-shelf algorithms to make sure that they meet our needs in the XYZ system
elements.2211.03149_5c9194b3ea3926c9db01846e55778: We also argue in later sections that if there exist algorithms that can satisfy the needs of a system, there is no need to develop those algorithms again by the researchers themselves; time and resources can be spared to develop the algorithms that are needed by the system but not available as off-the-shelf ones (such as our conflict detection model)
elements.2211.03149_39052d399dc087d8c818f7225d201: In other words, there is no need to reinvent the wheel
elements.2211.03149_1eb74e0901826942e8f59aba26a1a: , the microphone placed in a central place in a room constantly listens to the ambient environment
elements.2211.03149_4afe39a84d346878f29c8f19f0630: The audio stream is sliced into 5-second audio clips and send to the voice activity detection (VAD) model to decide if a given clip contains human voice
elements.2211.03149_4f15c58abbc5d7ec0670280d18785: The choice of each audio clip being 5-second is based on the observation from previous works that 5-second is long enough to be indicative of the speakers' emotions
elements.2211.03149_e0347d5f94098f8fd764c093ceec1: The XYZ System discards those audio clips that are invalid; i.e., they contain no human voice
elements.2211.03149_13b3d1a027eecdd757dbb858d8cc7: The valid audio clips are sent to the speaker identification (SID) model to detect if the audio clips contain the voice of registered speakers
elements.2211.03149_32e730af57fbde97b71d8979c9357: If yes, they are sent to the emotion detection and conflict detection models, in parallel
elements.2211.03149_c8e2c6f540a5cbad43371ed74a18e: The two models each produce vectors in respect to if the speaker(s) in an audio clip is/are angry or is/are in a verbal conflict
elements.2211.03149_46b1fd1c2815312f161d7d73e7b85: Note that the purpose of this paper is to demonstrate the necessary steps to be accomplished during the development stage before deployment to increase deployment time success, and show where continued work is still necessary
elements.2211.03149_4ae1892aacce8440b926f5fbee714: The purpose of this paper is not about how novel the algorithms used in the XYZ System are, although we show that the algorithms are effective at doing their respective jobs and satisfying the research needs.
elements.2211.03149_c3ae0df0ab9842eb3a1a053ddeae7: The Add-on Components to the XYZ System
elements.2211.03149_5bdfc391343000e859af56ff87a10: In this section, we describe three add-on components for the core XYZ system
elements.2211.03149_a3113c6e2697ce02bc64c2c942191: Note that the efficacy and effectiveness of the add-on components are not included in this paper because the main focus of the paper is the XYZ system
elements.2211.03149_502f9d1bd1f9633d954fdf6feb7de: The add-on components exist to assist the XYZ system by storing the audio clips classified by the XYZ system (in the cloud), sending the identified anger to the caregiver for them for them to be more attentive to their own emotions, and notifying the developers when the XYZ system crashes
elements.2211.03149_2ed2a36150028b5cbd19f282374d1: In addition to those assistive functionalities, one of the add-ons, the Recommender System, recommends tips to the caregivers to help them manage their anger
elements.2211.03149_f0ae116c5744c2feda8b323c2a2cf: The entirety of the XYZ system and its add-ons is referred to as the

elements.2211.03149_5573cd54f9dab9fc58967d9953cfa: One of the add-on components is the Recommender System with the EMA

elements.2211.03149_483f62fe8ec4137c6d67776286d6a: It is good to discover that these solutions are not likely to work at post-deployment time, because this helps us filter out such existing solutions

elements.2211.03149_79252b2985effeef6d4a3ee8266f0: To investigate, we employed 5 labellers who are approved by the IRB to listen to and label the saved clips of the participants' voices

elements.2211.03149_5e4c6b8785e7fc1b423107189451c: For conflict detection, currently, there is no available conflict detection algorithm that is acoustics-based
elements.2211.03149_50b0aaf88bce7baa877554a31677a: Therefore, we developed our own conflict detection algorithm
elements.2211.03149_8451afb27bc70db298198742be93d: In this Section, we aim to test on the conflict detection model: is it possible to perform comprehensive and realistic pre-deployment testing to improve post-deployment success?
elements.2211.03149_be2915de0b2e9cf2c3ea0f030f580: Here we briefly describe how the new algorithm we developed is trained and why the training process makes it specifically account for the (three) challenges that arise in the real, designated environment in which the algorithm is going to be deployed
elements.2211.03149_b7b1ae46def44ad1befe20aef897a: The training and testing samples are from 19 couples and each sample is labeled conflict if the content of the sample indicates that the couple are in a verbal conflict
elements.2211.03149_2a24279f7560f5ca65ae6807f0eb7: It is labeled non-conflict if the couple are not in a verbal conflict
elements.2211.03149_e0bc20fb8b4b332c9f09fd9e7498e: Since the samples are already collected from home-environments, de-amplification and reverberation are accounted for, but the samples are free of background noise
elements.2211.03149_2c166860cbc0e3c9c725106e85a2c: As a result, we mix each of the samples with background noise by randomly selecting a segment from a randomly chosen indoor background noise sample in Table
elements.2211.03149_8d6ce6aac9f4e4c70c3343043bbde: and overlaying that segment with each sample
elements.2211.03149_66c049ea8012399ab68ec222f5ff9: Out of the samples, there are 3,072 in the training set and 1,009 in the testing set
elements.2211.03149_d453bf86676a185285306613198d0: As a result, both the training and the testing set accounts for a variety range of indoor environmental distortions
elements.2211.03149_a8b6f34308dfb58e5f924fd35c9ac: Since the training samples are touched by deamplification, reverberation, and background noise, our conflict detection algorithm trained on them is designed to be able to handle the three challenges (deamplification, reverberation, and background noise)
elements.2211.03149_da4a2460acca84392f83dcf627ec7: The conflict detection model's performance on the testing set achieves an f1 score of 93.1
elements.2211.03149_ef72f1feb6b7040fd15de740f416c: The high performance suggests that the conflict detection is robust against environmental distortions such as reverberation, background noise, and deamplification
elements.2211.03149_59a5d9b45323ea691fac73dca3588: This help us set the stage to prove our hypothesis that, for an algorithm to work sufficiently in the real, designated environment in which challenges are perceived to be present, the algorithm must show that, during pre-deployment stage, it is able to handle the challenges
elements.2211.03149_353237249ff2cf9253603256dbb24: Our conflict detection algorithm has indicated that during pre-deployment stage, it is able to handle the three challenges: reverberation, deamplification, and background noise
elements.2211.03149_23092680c6256cfc23dd8def5c612: Note that we do not include TV sounds as one of the acoustic realisms that the conflict detection model needs to address
elements.2211.03149_810b0a1f4b14f8bdc5f6a12d01c51: In the future, we plan to develop a conflict detection algorithm that takes TV sounds into consideration.
elements.2211.03149_e1e7aa0fd689c1e81855005e081c8: In the post-deployment time, we seek to prove our hypothesis that, for an algorithm to work well post-deployment time in the real, designated environment in which it is going to be deployed, during pre-deployment stage it must show that it is capable of overcoming the challenges that are present in the real, designated environment
elements.2211.03149_e03b8399d99a5f54b0062afebfce2: Our conflict detection algorithm has showed that it is capable of overcoming the challenges (it achieves an f1 score of 93.1

elements.2211.03149_792db6809ddc1a5f7511a90fa86d6: In this Section we briefly summarize our findings in Section
elements.2211.03149_65896f1114b014c8fdf59f3b0829a: The first finding is that, to ensure post-deployment success of an algorithm, during pre-deployment time it must be rigorously tested on samples that are touched by the challenges that are perceived to be present in the real, designated environment during post-deployment time
elements.2211.03149_ee2c8d4e5e2d56c28bff47548375c: This finding is confirmed by the pre-deployment stage assessment results and post-deployment stage assessment results of the VAD model, the SID model, the emotion detection model, and the conflict detection model.
elements.2211.03149_87ab0e07d0c19424c33e4a6d286e9: The second finding is that in the acoustic processing pipeline we should always go for off-the-shelf solutions first before developing your own algorithm
elements.2211.03149_ea2fe70d0e085c4293f63fe5f8cbe: Many acoustic functions have been under study for many years and excellent solutions exist
elements.2211.03149_88ca50949cf807119cbd4fafbc12c: Yet, rigorous testing is still required since not all of the available solutions will work for the environment where the system will be deployed
elements.2211.03149_7786bacbf4e130437cd4ef1dcd9ce: In our case, the VAD, SID, and emotion detection models are off-the-shelf
elements.2211.03149_35efb2599ef8d0e8d6b2888a9a20f: Since there are no state-of-the-art conflict detection models that
elements.2211.03149_0a581cb22a1968f686f21c000b478: to detect verbal conflict, this has to be developed and will not have the luxury of having solutions refined many many researchers over many years
elements.2211.03149_fbc962236eaeb89048daa03fef737: This likely is why the performance is lower than the well developed acoustic functions.
elements.2211.03149_2e80f62dc90cb7ee8c15ba8d22429: Deploying research systems over long time periods requires significant adaptability in many ways
elements.2211.03149_238674f95e1917c099c14004e1414: Because the user is central, in this section we concentrate on adaptability in regards to the user interface.
elements.2211.03149_4d0729429d88257ffc28a70cceed1: EMA apps are common interfaces to humans
elements.2211.03149_80a0b97a0f602b9d909bbb7c231e8: They are used to send messages to the participants and receive responses
elements.2211.03149_969b2094ca75afaa8b4e2fe10d836: In our system messages are the interventions or recommendations based on the output of the emotion, conflict detection, and reinforcement learning recommendation modules
elements.2211.03149_f4b1647a3807c91f070b44037a96a: During the pre-deployment time, we collaborated with a team of psychologists and specialists from the nursing field and determined four main categories of interventions/recommendations: the breathing exercise, which encourages the participants to take deep breaths to calm down, the timeout exercise, which encourages the participants to take a timeout/break from engaging with their loved one (the dementia patient), the mindfulness exercise, which encourages them to practice mindfulness, and enjoyable activities, which encourage them to partake activities that they enjoy
elements.2211.03149_e7bb85ac6c5949c64391bbd2f71cd: Each of these categories contains multiple subcategories
elements.2211.03149_17646faf27ea27f35c18b31bd8e43: Our implementation allows the exact wordings of the messages to be easily changeable in case during the deployment time the participants preferred different wording.
elements.2211.03149_1a9055eaf7c0d522fecadce4f81b1: Indeed, during the deployment time, we received feedback from the some participants that certain messages seemed insensitive and harsh, and the insensitivity and harshness of the messages actually discouraged them from implementing the recommended interventions
elements.2211.03149_531344f9d2c773d36eaf413624e54: To fix this problem for these users, we went back to the EMA app and easily changed the wording based on the participants' complaints
elements.2211.03149_e2f51726f6d4c05f04bcd54fe4642: After we made the changes to the wording for all participants, they no longer felt the wording as insensitive and harsh, and were encouraged by the messages to implement the interventions.
elements.2211.03149_6974ab7ea14115378ab9c4b11e2f2: We have previously stated in Section
elements.2211.03149_f676d27f8720dc734d121a2a6cbf0: that there are four categories of interventions or recommendations
elements.2211.03149_788146ad4641e840c0acb246f2da2: In this Section, we describe how we make the personalized recommendations adaptable during pre-deployment time and verify if our strategy (that makes the recommendations adaptable) succeeds during post-deployment time.
elements.2211.03149_a8cb9261abc822002a531dea56880: We have also stated that during pre-deployment time we made the EMA app to be easily adjustable in case we need to change the interventions or recommendations
elements.2211.03149_0d77e56ec6d4a3cc80359aac2321e: The EMA app is easily adjustable because it reads text questions (such as the list of enjoyable activities for the participants) from a database and to change that list, we just need to go to the database instead of recompiling the app every time we make changes to the list of text surveys and interventions
elements.2211.03149_83ba81df4d80c3a30b000316484fe: The adaptability of the EMA app and, therefore, the XYZ-W system came in handy when we discovered that participants want more specific recommendations, especially under the category of enjoyable activities
elements.2211.03149_868f827f4a385d3ef42378fbf9b1c: In other words, instead of a generic
elements.2211.03149_c4187b395c91ab764278c328a9114: now it's time to do some enjoyable activities,
elements.2211.03149_71d5cd78a47fe27338202c55ee7fa: they wanted the enjoyable activities to be more specific and personalized such as
elements.2211.03149_ba95db6f0cd5de838e08cd6928079: now it's time to play with the family cat.
elements.2211.03149_f3b0a7d4d4a7d80c6ab1d2c693bf8: To accommodate this, we asked each participant to provide us a list of their personalized enjoyable activities
elements.2211.03149_ba308cc50968259a5d741aa72ecbd: Because the EMA app was made to be easily adjustable, the integration of the personalized enjoyable activities for each participant was quick and easy.
elements.2211.03149_44608a5559e1c24352d1cd8c64da3: The participants of all six dyads reported that they liked the personalization (we asked them through surveys during our interviews with them)
elements.2211.03149_f6fe43a0100224bbafbb9c2cf34b6: For smart health apps that make recommendations, we feel that it is imperative to be able to change them to accommodate the personal needs of the participants.
elements.2211.03149_c5a4bac02fa47985623efa2dedcb2: Before we deployed our XYZ-W System, we decided to only send out at the end of the day post-recommendation surveys that asked the participants if they had implemented the recommendations
elements.2211.03149_2d17ba9020e94deea3be9279e41b4: Then, we received requests from the participants that they would like some positive feedback after they implemented the recommendations
elements.2211.03149_c838e29e573b1fa163857afe6b3dd: The positive feedback should acknowledge the effort they put in to adhering to the recommendations and remind them of the importance of implementing the recommendations (to improve their mental health and lessen their care-giving burden)
elements.2211.03149_ec6c616af956aed7fea93e2269808: Again, because the EMA app was designed at pre-deployment time to be easily changed, integrating the feature of positive feedback into the existing system was quick and easy
elements.2211.03149_c6ea76674071e2c6e054a8afd9cc6: The participants of all six dyads reported to have liked the positive feedback.
elements.2211.03149_be3859755b496872fe346f333be86: The main takeaway message in Section
elements.2211.03149_53eb4db79f7d3c3a2e94b3ef28f7e: is that researchers need to anticipate the need of the participants and make sure that their technology (in our case, the add-on components to the XYZ System), is adaptable to those needs
elements.2211.03149_2ad6b880a695bcec5d9ffd5a70be3: For example, we initially set the positive feedback times to be in the morning and in the evening, but participants report that they want the positive feedback more often
elements.2211.03149_a02a791b4ef80748bc2e92de9c122: Since we have anticipated that they might have the need (to want to see the positive feedback more often), we have designed our add-on components in such a way that allows the change to be easily made.
elements.2211.03149_c48de9b1b81a344dd1df56c82c2dc: Developing new research systems that will be deployed in homes require solutions for privacy issues during recruitment and during deployment
elements.2211.03149_eb2938a104c19736673634dc61bd2: This is especially true when using sensing that can be considered invasive such a microphones
elements.2211.03149_4ef28e01c141faaef7cadaa53dbff: Our XYZ system is privacy-conserving, meaning that it concentrates on allowing users to benefit from its functionalities without releasing their voice data in its original form.
elements.2211.03149_70023937d14cf4196a1ca9ec82bc5: During pre-deployment a set of privacy mechanisms were implemented
elements.2211.03149_54bbc95f033423cf0ae6df0cd2e9d: This included that users could set the day start and end times when the system is operational, turn off the system at any point, e.g., when a visitor was there, all voice from non-registered speakers would not be recorded, and that the content of speech would not be recorded, i.e., only prosidy features would be recorded
elements.2211.03149_80cf621dd9894bc570a67546c075c: During recruitment, the above privacy mechanisms were fully described to potential dyads
elements.2211.03149_34592364260628acfadc3c0c9544c: Also, using a graph and tables we showed them what prosidy means
elements.2211.03149_6b6032a5101fc4434a499287f8550: Nevertheless, one in four care-giving dyads who rejected participation in the study worried about the privacy issue despite the thorough explanation of the study procedures
elements.2211.03149_0faf3ea923db147eaa595d153ffaa: Basically, once we explained that our system listens to them for anger/conflict events, it caused some of the prospective dyads to think about privacy invasion and they declined to participate in the study
elements.2211.03149_a363d4f2d56b54a48fe0aff5fbaba: describes the reasons that potential participants did not choose to participate in our study: 3 potential participants did not meet the criteria to be included in our study. 15 potential participants lost interest in participating and did not reply to our call for screening that they must pass in order to be included in our study. 12 potential participants decided upfront with us during our communication with them that they were not interested. 10 potential participants found the study to likely be burdensome. 2 potential participants in our follow-up calls with them indicated that they are no longer interested in the study. 9 potential participants were no longer interested to participate due to various issues such as the patient passing away. 17 potential participants refused to participate out of the concern for privacy issues
elements.2211.03149_cccf3e66d23ee0e3f4cac46a7f3af: Privacy is the main reason for 25
elements.2211.03149_1d5ec651601e431186fe15adfe5f9: of those interviewed (the largest percentage among all categories of the reasons to not participate)
elements.2211.03149_21b28eb4220917af837bcbafdbcc2: It can be expected that when deploying sensing systems in homes some people will reject the system
elements.2211.03149_a857690e73ca0cb7d30d94707bc51: With enough privacy mechanisms we were able to limit those not willing to participate due to privacy to 25

elements.2211.03149_a38576ed1cbc1c9aa1f9d510ad4a8: Using a survey after the 4 month study, five out of six of the recruited dyads agreed that their privacy concerns are addressed and they have had no issue regarding privacy
elements.2211.03149_463174acca015d7ad651592d35f54: However, one dyad still has some concerns over their privacy
elements.2211.03149_2db48ded00905d5c74385bc7f0850: In this home, the Alzheimers' patient (not the caregiver) pulled out the wires that connect our equipment to the power source, for he feared that during the time the system is set to not monitor them, the system is still actively listening.
elements.2211.03149_bde980419c938659e8d98cd2b7608: We countered this distrust our system by showing these participants the data we collected: namely, we showed them the timestamps of the voice samples that we collected so they knew that outside of the active hours of the system that we were true to our word and the system did not listen to them
elements.2211.03149_200e0a3cd976dbfb6e1a0ece95478: We also showed them amplitude plots of the data we collected where there are no words
elements.2211.03149_654e10dd70697f20827907b9cf159: We also showed them that there did not exist files which recorded the transcriptions of their conversation, since some concerns had been raised such that the participants were worried about being transcribed.
elements.2211.03149_b012480db878c626bab3a032c8193: Privacy concerns are likely to arise when researchers deploy their technology in the home environments
elements.2211.03149_c8013a330e38f3c537a2967f18609: During the pre-deployment stage, researchers must implement privacy mechanisms even if they are not the core purpose of the system
elements.2211.03149_f106715e62b9871eecdb1550bd961: These mechanisms must be explained to participants
elements.2211.03149_83f441ee1101cb8d19866d6cd935a: We believe that the mechanisms we describe can be used in many systems that utilize speech of the participants.
elements.2211.03149_c043c2ebb76106aca481045501b48: Finally, the responses from the dyads at post-deployment time provide some evidence that privacy can be addressed to users' satisfaction.
elements.2211.03149_d4bc2d5e07d04558faee07b9772bf: As research projects (not pilot studies), smart health groups often design novel smart technologies to be deployed in people's homes

elements.2211.03149_abf1bb43c59324948c4af9a9d873e: In this paper, using the XYZ system as a case study, we present and evaluate various techniques for acoustic pipelines, adaptability of the user interface, and privacy that increase deployment time success.
